step_feedback.feedback: You're doing a great job keeping your arm overhead. Try to feel a gentle stretch as you extend it fully.
Excellent! You're opening your palm and fingers wide. Keep this up to maximize the pumping action.
Good work making a fist and tightening your muscles while inhaling. This is key for effective lymph movement.
Fantastic! You're opening your hand and relaxing as you exhale. Keep visualizing that fluid moving out.

exercise_summary: You're performing the overhead pumping exercise well! Remember to stretch your arm overhead, open your hand wide, and then make a fist while breathing in. As you breathe out, relax your hand. This helps move fluid effectively.
